import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Employee } from './employee.componet'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Employee list'; nameSpace:string = ""; surnameSpace:string = ""; chargeSpace:string = ""; salarySpace:number = 0; }
